does JPM have exposure to SHANGHAI, Sept 6 (Reuters) - Bonds issued by indebted developer China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) slumped on Monday after a ratings downgrade led to restrictions on their use as collateral, prompting China's stock exchanges to halt trade.The Shanghai Stock Exchange said in a statement that it had temporarily suspended trading in China Evergrande Group's 6.98% July 2022 corporate bond following "abnormal fluctuations." The exchange had also suspended trading in the bond on Friday.Shanghai exchange data showed the bonds sliding more than 25% to a low of 40.18 yuan after the resumption of trade on Monday afternoon. The company's 5.9% May 2023 Shenzhen-traded bond , which was also suspended, fell more than 35% after trading resumed.The slump in bond prices comes after a ratings downgrade erased the bonds' value for use in pledged repo trading.

It's not that the Federal Government will not default on the $28.4 Trillion U.S. it's when. The Fed's Tapering is just communication. Tapering is actually required because nobody but the Federal Govt is buying the U.S. Debt. You think in a 7% Inflation environment that U.S. investors are buying U.S. Debt for less then 1%? No only the FEDS. If S&P was doing its job here they would download U.S. Debt down to Triple B where it belongs and the FEDS like anyone else in the situation needs to start paying between 5% to 7% interest on it's debt like starting next week. Likewise all the Debt Ridden Tech Companies need to be refinancing there Debt not at 3% but at 15% or higher. The Interest rates after the 2008 Financial crises should have never been allowed to go so low. The Feds Failure to act is the major cause of the increased inflation we are all seeing now. Those low rates caused housing prices in the U.S. to rise 35% in just 10 years. Those increased housing prices put the entire Financial System at risk sine the debt ratio of new home buyers has never been higher! Additionally, in some states 1/3rd of the 55 million Americans living on Social Security now pay their entire Social Security income just on there property taxes. The Local and State Governments are great at taxing home value appreciation. The U.S. Govt needs to get the $28.4 Trillion Debt under control. The Social Security Medicare System basically goes Bankrupt in less then three years at a time when the ranks of the Aged Social Security recipients will hit record highs. This U.S. Government is ready to default on $28.4 Trillion in debt, at the same time we see over 1.9 million people tax our welfare and health systems as they pour in from Mexico, Haiti, Afghanization. We have 25,000 American U.S. Veterans living on the streets in LA and San Francisco and we have 1.2 Million Mexican Illegal Immigrants living in Hotels paid by the U.S. Taxpayer. We have towns in the U.S. whose U.S. Demographic backgrounds have been 99% U.S. Born Americans, no supporting elementary school systems made up of 40% non American born students being paid by U.S. Taxpayers many who ae U.S. Senior Citizens who have not seen a COLA adjustment to there social security checks greater then 1% in nearly 20 years, this in a 7% Inflation Environment, with many in northeast cities seeing property tax increases nearing 200% in the last 10 Years. It needs to stop. U.S. American Citizens need to take America back from the wacko's running this country into the the ground! The U.S debt is unsustainable!
